content.question: If f'(x) and g'(x) exist and f'(x) > g'(x) for all real x, then the graph of y = f(x) and the graph of y = g(x)

choices.label: have a common tangent at each point of intersection.

topic.text: 5.3: Determining Intervals on Which a Function Is Increasing or Decreasing
